title: Pls help
content: Which hostel to take? IT or New? Plss tell

comments.body: Id suggest the new one, it has fresh rooms and CLEAN washrooms, bTw congratulations for joining PES
I guess its called new hostel for a reason xD
Thanks, pls tell me its good
Take the new block any day . IT block have shared washrooms while in new block you get a washroom in each room. You got to apply fast the rooms in NB are less in number and tend to fill up quickly.
What advantage does individual bathroom have?
Bruhh , individual bathrooms only you and your roommates are gonna use while in common/shared bathrooms the entire floor is gonna use the same bathroom
